short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open random bookmarks from a chosen folder

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pick a folder, roll the die! This extension lets you open randomly-selected bookmarks from a folder of your choice.

Features:
- Pin your favorite folders to the top for easier access
- Decide for yourself whether subfolders are included
- Made with care to provide a friendly, functional interface
